open.title: Vumatel Outage | Witbank
open.description: Vumatel has informed us of a network outage affecting Witbank, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Vumatel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Fibre repairs are on-going, affected clients may experience intermittent connectivity. MetroFibre's current estimated time for completion is 31/07/2023 at 17:00. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

The following areas are affected.

Albermarle
Castleview
Dinwiddie
Elandshaven
Elandspark
Florentia
Germiston
Gosforth park
Linmeyer
South Crest
The Hills
Verwoerdpark
Union Free Standing Houses
